sentences.en: As their fat is depleted, the humps become floppy and flabby.
sentences.cn: 当驼峰储存的脂肪被用光时,驼峰就会变得松驰干瘪.

sentences.en: Flat: Having low acidity; the next stage after flabby.
sentences.cn: 无力的: 酸度低, 紧跟在“松弛”后面.

sentences.en: From the cellar grating floated up the flabby gush of porter.
sentences.cn: 隔着地窖的格子窗飘出走了气的黑啤酒味儿.

sentences.en: Girl skin is flabby, dry. What method can be improved?
sentences.cn: 女孩皮肤松弛, 干燥. 有什么方法能改善 呢 ?

sentences.en: He isn't just fat, he's flabby.
sentences.cn: 他不光是肥胖, 而且肌肉松弛.

sentences.en: He soft and flabby since he gave up running.
sentences.cn: 他停止跑步锻炼以后肌肉就松弛了.

sentences.en: He's getting fat and flabby because he doesn't have enough exercise.
sentences.cn: 他因为缺少锻炼而日见肥胖肌肉松弛.

sentences.en: His eyes were not keen, his face marked, his hands flabby.
sentences.cn: 他目光呆滞, 满脸皱纹, 双手无力.

sentences.en: I am a shy and flabby ( weak ) girl who is afraid of changing.
sentences.cn: 我是个害羞.软弱. 害怕改变的女孩.用英语怎么说?

sentences.en: I became rather flabby after I stopped playing football regularly.
sentences.cn: 停止了经常踢球之后,我的肌肉变得相当松弛了.

sentences.en: It felt very flabby, and the myocardium was poorly contractile.
sentences.cn: 摸上去非常软, 心肌收缩力下降.

sentences.en: My bulging thighs and flabby stomach made me depressed.
sentences.cn: 我大腿太粗，肚子上也净是赘肉，让我很发愁。

sentences.en: The band’s performance was tired and flabby.
The unfit person will tend to be flabby and possibly fat.
sentences.cn: 这个身体不佳的人趋于肌肉松弛很可能变肥胖.

sentences.en: Too little protein in your diet makes your muscle soft and flabby.
sentences.cn: 饮食中蛋白太少会使你的肌肉松驰.

sentences.en: When I compare my flabby tummy to a kangaroo pouch, say nothing.
sentences.cn: 在我把我松弛的肚子和袋鼠的育儿袋相比时, 你不要说任何话.

words.tran_cn: 松弛地；软弱地；无活力地
松弛的；软弱的；没气力的；优柔寡断的

trans.tran_en: having unattractive soft loose flesh rather than strong muscles
